CustomField.description: When the Sync Jira Issues to PSA Project Tasks is enabled, it determines the type of Jira issues which is sync to PSA project tasks. This value is case-sensitive and the issue types must exist in your Jira application.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the Sync Jira Issues to PSA Project Tasks is enabled, it determines the type of Jira issues which is sync to PSA project tasks. This value is case-sensitive and the issue types must exist in your Jira application.
CustomField.label: Project Task Jira Issue Types
